about_the_game:
Terradune Demo

Embark on your adventure by exploring the first zone of Terradune, a beautifully crafted world filled with mystery and challenges.

Choose Your Path:
Select from three unique classes, each offering distinct playstyles. Whether you prefer the swift agility of a rogue, the raw power of a warrior, or the mystical abilities of a mage, your journey will be shaped by your choice. Experiment with different skills and builds to find the perfect fit for your playstyle.

Quest for Glory:
Engage in dynamic quests that introduce you to the lore and inhabitants of Terradune. Complete tasks, help locals, and uncover secrets as you navigate this vibrant world.

Fast-Paced Combat:
Master a responsive combat system that rewards timing and strategy. Combine melee, ranged, and magical attacks to conquer foes in exhilarating real-time battles.

Immersive Exploration:
Venture through the first zone, packed with hidden paths, secret treasures, and detailed environments. Uncover the mysteries that lie within as you explore every corner.

Stunning Hand-Drawn Art:
Experience a beautifully designed world brought to life with vibrant colors and meticulous details, capturing both the charm and danger of Terradune.

Start Your Legend:
Begin your journey in this captivating 2D action RPG. Will you rise as a hero or forge your own path in Terradune?

Dive into the Terradune Demo and get a taste of the adventure awaiting you.
